1.content: First off who are you?
1.title: Character selection

choices: A drunken traveler was walking towards them
They where approached by another group of humans
11.content:
David

Hight 6.2

Hair colour black

Age 17

Eye colour green

Build slim but very muscular for his age and size

David was traveling with a group of soldiers to one of the macro kingdoms to make peace. For years the two kingdoms have being battling over petty things like land and who's the better race but no more the new generation on both sides have decided to end the pointless bloodshed, but in order for this to happen the kings son David must marry one of the macro kings daughters the only problem besides the fact that his future wife could swallow him whole, is that none knows what species they are they could be, dragons, wolves, bears, bunny, foxes you name it.

All right men we'll camp here for the night!! David called to his men, they gave a relieved sigh to finally be able to rest from nearly 6 hours traveling.

As everyone began to set up there tents something happened but what?
11.title: David the young knight

111.content:
Out of nowhere macro wolves started to jump out from the forest picking up Daniels men and stuffing them in giant pouches that where strapped to there loincloth. Damn it! Daniel ran towards the nearest macro intending to slice the back of his ancle " aaarrrr thump" David was lightly kicked by a nearby wolf who saw what he was trying to do.

As Daniel was flying through the air he landed on the ground rolling onto his back " ow that one hurt" Daniel started to stand up not noticing the incoming paw of one of the wolves, oooffff the macro had Daniel in its grasp his head and shoulders where poking out of the top of its hand, he looked up at the face of his capture and was surprised to see the face of a female wolf she had midnight black fur and dark green eyes they looked so beautiful he just couldn't look away from those magnificent green orbs, but Daniel soon snapped out of his little trance when he remembered the position he was in.

This made the macro frown she was a little disappointed that he looked away from her she was rather enjoying the looks he was giving her oh well she shrugged then put Daniel in her pouch and took off with the other wolves to.
111.title: Ambush!!

choices: Stay with one of the other villagers
Stay with one of my children
1111.content:
" shit how could this happen" Daniel said aloud, how did they get the drop on us we should have being better prepared for this " as Daniel was thinking of ways to escape the pouch was being poored upside down and Daniel was sent tumbling down into the soft paw of a macro.

Dazed and confused Daniel looked round the room and spotted the same macro who captured him " leave us Luna " a deep voice rumbled from behind Daniel. Startled by the voice Daniel turned round and face the owner of the voice and boy was he scared there in front of Daniel was the owner of both the voice and the paw that Daniel was standing on, the macro was male that was certain he had greying patches of fur on his body and he looked like he was in his fortys, he was also wearing a necklace that was made out of human skulls (gulp) and had a good few stars on his body.

So you must be Daniel son of the that famous macro slayer am I correct" the old wolf spoke in a deep voice. Yes I am sir and you are Daniel replied back showing no fear the wolf smiled at the boys fearlessn " my name is kootas and I'm the chief of this village " Daniel guessed as much the guy gave of and aura of authority " so why am I here and we're are my men.

Your men are safe and unharmed and your here because you intend to marry one of our enemies daughters " Daniel wasn't too surprised to hear that it did make a lot of scenes " so what you gonna kill me so that won't be an alliance " kootas smirk at Daniel oh I could do that but I have a better idea " oh and what would that be.

(Chuckle) well instead of marrying someone from that kingdom why don't you marry someone from my tribe that way we'd be your allies and that kingdom won't bother my tribe anymore, hummm that wouldn't be a bad idea I mean Iwe don't exactly know a lot about this kingdom we just need allies on a bigger scale so this could work out only one problem.

And what's that kootas said tilting his head " well for starters I'd have to inform my father then he would have to inform the other kingdom that the marriage is off then he'd have to meet you and discuss all kinds of political crap.

Kootas nodded at this " well all that can be arranged in the morning but for now we'll need to find you a place to sleep hum you could.
1111.title: The village

choices: Daniels soldiers come to rescue him
11111.content:
Umm I don't know about that chief " oh please call me kootas " ok kootas im don't think that would be a safe idea I mean what if you roll on me or something Daniel worried. Oh I didn't mean with me I'll set up a little bed for you in the corner of my hut so your not in any danger " Daniel still wasn't too convinced but he decided to trust the old wolf " ok then I'll take your word for it " kootas smiled at the small boy and began to make a little bed for Daniel in the far corner.

Ok I'm done Daniel kootas said looking down at Daniel that was standing by his right thigh " ok thanks kootas " Daniel walked towards the makeshift bed and began to take off his armour and clothes " yawwwwnn damn didn't realise how tired I was thanks again fo- Daniel didn't get a chance to finish his sentence when he saw the old wolf was already fast asleep " wow that was pretty damn fast guess he must've being really tired " Daniel climbed into bed and fell asleep.
11111.title: Stay with me

111111.content:
Daniel woke up to kootas heavy snoring (groan) " shit it feels like there's an earthquake " Daniel sat up in his bed looking round the hut it was dark but he could still see just fine (sigh) there's no way I'm getting any sleep like this" Daniel stood up and started to walk around the hut looking at all of the makeshift weapons and bowls.

As Daniel continued to wander he bumped into something furry " what the oh " Daniel had walked into kootas sheath the musky stench was overpowering his sense of smell " ugh ok I'm going back to sleep now " Daniel said horrified by what he walked into.

Just as Daniel was about to climb in bed he looked up and saw a little cage hanging above the chiefs head. Humm I wonder what's in there " Daniel started to walk back towards the cage and started looking for a way up, out of the corner of his eyes he saw a rope leading up to the cage.

Daniel walked up to it and started to climb up he was halfway there when.
111111.title: Through the night

1111112.content: Daniel began falling down towards kootas.
1111112.title: The rope snapped

11111121.content:
Daniel fell into the fang filled maw of the sleeping titan his face making contact with the giant lupines tounge instinctively causing kootas to close his mouth trapping the boy inside.

Shit fucking damn it " Daniel cursed trying to fight of the huge tongue that was trying to savour his taste.

Outside of the jaws of death kootas was sleeping peacefully not realising he was about to swallow Daniel alive. Come on you old bastard wake up! Daniel screamed trying to get the wolfs attention.

Daniel didn't know what to do he was trying to think of something anything that could get him out of this situation but his thinking was interrupted when.
11111121.title: Open mouth

11112.content: Who will you be staying with?
11112.title: Stay with one of the other villagers

111121.content:
Luna? She’s the one who brought me here right? Kootas nodded his head “yes she’s one of my best hunters and from how she was looking at you earlier I’d say she likes you so she’d probably be the best choice at the moment.”

Here let me just set you down so I can go get her. Kootas placed you down on the ground in front of him, once you leaped off his hand he stood up and walked towards the flap which was the door to the hut.

The last thing you saw was kootas bushy tail disappear behind the flap. It had being a few minutes since kootas left you where starting to get bored you started to think of something you could do, to pass the time but your thinking was interrupted when kootas walked into the hut with an eager looking Luna.

Sorry it took so long Daniel but now that Lunas here you two can go now” kootas walked to the back of the hut leaving you with Luna she’d bent down to a crouch and placed her hand flap on the ground beside you. You couldn’t help but notice the wooshing sound coming from behind her? You looked between her legs and saw it was her tail wagging you also saw her smiling down at you.

You just smiled back at her and started to climb onto her awaiting palm. Once you were safely seat she began to stand up and walked out of the chiefs hut and Bach to hers. Neither of you said anything on the way to Lunas hut even when you got there and she placed you on the ground she just smiled but she also looked nervous.

The awkward silence went on for a awhile until one of them broke it. But who?
111121.title: Luna

11113.title: Stay with one of my children

113.content: What species is the traveler.
113.title: A drunken traveler was walking towards them

11312.content:
David looked ahead and saw a macro grizzly she had huge breasts and quite a big ass. She looked like she had one too many and was no tripping all over, this isn't good David thought and the huge ursine came closer and closer.

When she was only a few feet away she looked down once her eyes landed on David she stopped and got down on all fours her muzzle was now just a few inches from davids face (sniff sniff) the suction from the bears nose caused David to stumble this made the huge bear giggle.

" hello there little man what are you doing so far in macro territory " she said grinning showing her huge white teeth, " where traveling to the macro kingdom my lady " David gave a little bow causing her to giggle again. Ohhhh really well if your going there that means you must be prince David son of lecture the slayer she stated loosing her smile, " well yes that me but my father doesn't go by that title anymore he just wants peace and I am no different.

(Chuckle)

Well if that's true then you won't mind if I do this (kiss) the bear woman pressed her lips onto Davids face drenching his hair in saliva that smelt of ale " well that was unexpected " David said blushing giggle " your a cute little knight you know that " she said smiling.

Um thank you miss.

Elaine

Elaine that's a lovely name mys David, I already know silly Elaine said still smiling at David. Hey do you mind if.
11312.title: Female

11321.content:
As the huge tiger stumbled towards you one of your men approached him speaking in the best courageous voice he could muster at the drunken titan.

" you are in the presence of king lecture the slayers son prince David of th-oooffffth BOOM David tackled the soldier out of the way of the tigers foot just in the nick of time.

" soldier from now on I'll do the talking understood " David spoke in s commanding tone the soldier just fearfully nodded his eyes glued to the spot he was just standing which now had a huge imprint in it.

David looked up at the unaware titan thinking how could he get his attention he thought a few seconds until he saw a rock on the ground not too far where he was standing " don't take this personally big guy " David picked up the rock and threw it st the tigers head, hitting him at the back of the head.

The tiger
11321.title: Male

12.content:
Mike is one of the best thieves are is not many could steal from macros and get away from it but he had and still is.

Mike is 17 years old with blonde hair blue eyes and has a slim not the most strongest but he was very fast and clever after all brute strength isn't gonna help when your target is a macro.

Well let's see who's on the list today mike said pulling out a sheet of paper with a few names on it.

Hummm let's see there's.
12.title: Mike the thief

choices: Find some way to distract them
121.content:
Calico age 39

Spieces grey wolf with black fur that's greying in some places has gold coloured eyes.

Calico was a mighty warrior back in his time but his age is starting to catch up with him he is well know for his riches and his incredible strength in battle. He stays in his castle for most of the time very rarely leaves his kingdom but he does love to go out hunting tiny humans. Now the humans he hunts are mainly people he knows who are his friends he would never harm them but if you where an intruder in his lands god help you.

Hummm well I'd better be very careful he may be old be he's still a very big threat. The journey to calicos castle was an uneventful one the guards where easy to sneak until you came to his bedroom door that had two guards one at the left side and one at the right both where heavily armoured. They where both wolves one a black and white and the other was a brownish colour both had the stances of professionals.

Well it doesn't look like I'm getting in through the front Door as easy as I thought but I could try.
121.title: Calico king of the lupine empire

1211.content:
Mike stayed as close to walls as he could hiding behind any thing that was big enough to keep him hidden, ok I'm nearly there but mike froze when he heard one of the guards speak.

Hey ruffus is it ok if I go take a leak the black and white wolf said, yeah just hurry up Jerome I don't want to have to explain to our king why your not here again ruffus said. Yeah yeah I know I'll be as quick as I can Jerome said stomping in your direction. Boom boooom boooooom each step the big wolf took was like and earth quake to you the vibrations of his stomping paws caused you to stumble out in to the open.

Oh no you looked up and saw.
1211.title: Sneaking past them

choices: You get stuck between his toes
12111.content:
You saw jeromes padded foot coming right towards you.

What happens next.
12111.title: The underside of Jeromes paw

choices: The king comes out to see what all the commotion is
12112.content:
Hey!! Who the hell are you Jerome shouted pointing his sword right at you hey ruffus we got an intruder here, what ruffus said walking towards the two of you. Wooh wooh hey take it easy guys I'm not an intruder mike lied with a nervous look on his face. Oh is that so then what are you doing here then ruffus said with a raised brow, ummm well I'm a guest his lordship didn't tell you about me mike faked shock, umm no he didn't and even if you are a guest why are you here.

Well I was on my to my beb chambers but I guess I got a little lost. Do they believe you
12112.title: Jerome looking right at you

choices: Calico writting on the desk you where standing on!!!!
1212.content: Mike found a way to calicos window which was luckily open he jumped in through the open window and landed on a desk he looked up and saw.
1212.title: Going in through the window

choices: His furry balls and sheath coming right at you!!!
He was rolling away from you
12121.content:
A smirk appeared on your face when you saw the big wolf fast asleep, this is gonna be easy you thought as you scanned the room for anything worth stealing but to your disappointment you only saw some clothes, boots and a lot of books looks like someone likes to read you muttered as you started to walk away but something sparkling caught your eye you looked back and saw a ring it looked like it was made out of pure cold and it had a ruby on the top, only one problem it was on the slumbering titans finger.

Well it's either I go hungry or take a risk you decide the latter.

Mike climbed down from the desk and quietly made his way to the bottom of calicos bed the sheets where hanging a few feet from the floor luckily you could reach them, mike jumped up and grabbed the cloth and started to climb. Once you reached the top of his bed you looked up and saw his big foot/paw its stunk of sweat but you just powered through it and started to walk round his foot but you stopped when you noticed how big this guy was his big toe was the same size as you.

(Gulp) I'd really need to be careful I don't want to be crushed under this guys paw you thought as you slowly made your way towards his hand/paw luckily he was laying on his side so you didn't need to climb him just as you where nearing his crotch area he started to move.

Oh shit you looked up and saw.
12121.title: Calico sleeping

121212.content:
He rolled onto his other side his tail and ass was now in your view (sigh) that was close but now I e gott- you stopped when you saw something at the base of his tail it was a tail ring?

Your eyebrow raised at the sight I never would've thought he'd be wearing something that was for a female but you weren't complaining this looks just as valuable you said as you made your way towards his backside but just when you where a few feet away he started to roll over again and this time his butt was coming right at you.

You looked up at the huge ass that was coming right at you thinking oh god n- BOOOM you where now trapped in between his furry butt cheeks with his tail hole right above you. Oh please don't fart you said out loud but to your horror he started to shift he was.
121212.title: He was rolling away from you

1212121.content:
mike could feel calicos tail hole getting closer and closer as he sat up oh god please don't notice me you thought.

Once calico was sat up he stretched and yawned once he was done yawning he looked to his left and right (sigh) well I guess I'm waking up alone he again he said with a sad look on his face, he'd being dreaming about waking up and looking at the face of his boyfriend smiling at him the memories of those precious moments they spent together were enough to get his tail wagging but it stopped the second he remembered his love was dead, his soon to be mate was murdered by another rival kingdom that wanted him dead.

Back underneath calicos rump mike was starting to get uncomfortable the heat from calicos ass was starting to make thing hard to breathe he needed to get out now, ok just slowly move back and he might not notice me mike thought as he slowly started to crawl on his back hoping that his movements wouldn't be felt.

Calico could feel something moving under his tail hole what in the name of Luna is that he said reaching under himself he felt his finger touching something it felt like...... A LEG he grabbed mikes leg and pulled him out from under his butt and dangled his body in front of his mouth (growling) who are you he said with a really pissed of look.

Mike nearly pissed himself at the site of calicos mouth, I'm I'm mike sir he said his voice trembling with fear. And what exactly are you doing in here he said taking notice of mikes clothing a thief humm calico thought well from the look of you I'd say your here to steal from me boy.

Ummm well I um your stuttering brought a smile to calicos face ummm well I um what calico said in a playful way look kid you've being caught so you might as well tell me the truth and if you do I might not punish you he said.

Damn it there's no way out of this one you thought ids better just tell him (sigh) ok my names mike and I'm a thief I mainly steal from the rich and I heard your very wealthy macro so- so you thought you could just sneak into my home and take whatever you'd like hummm NO!!!! You shouted I don't just take whatever I like stuff that has sentimental value I leave but the stuff that people don't need and can just replace I do take.

Oh is that so then what were you going to steal from me he said curious, I was going to take that tail rin- you didn't get a chance to finish as you felt something fuzzy pressed up against your mouth, shooosh not so loud boy I don't want the whole kingdom know about that he said growling in case you didn't notice I'm gay and I was engaged to another wolf he said but he died a long time ago that ring was his and I'm very attached to it he said looking into your eyes.

Oh I'm so sorry I didn't know I thought it was just for fashion or something mike said his voice full of guilt. Calico could tell you where telling the truth and that you where genuinely sorry thanks kid it means a lot he said smiling a little well since you were honest with me I won't throw you in the dungeon but your not off the hook yet he said smirking.

(Gulp) what are you gonna do you said frightened calico couldn't help but smile at you well seen as you broke into my home I think you should make up for that he said setting you down on the bed once you felt the covers on your back you started to stand but you didn't move from where he put you, so what do I need to you said scared and a little curious oh you'll see just close your eyes and keep perfectly still he said winking at you.

You decided you'd better do as he said you stood up straight and closed your eyes you could feel calico moving on the bed you felt something wasn't right so you slightly opened your eyes to see what he was doing but your eyes where wide open the second you saw his big.
1212121.title: Sitting up

choices: Calico started to push you out
You were getting pulled further in
12121211.content:
Shit!!!! You dodged just his incoming rear just in the nick of time but the force of his ass slamming down on the bed bounced you up in the air you got a good view of his ceiling whilst you where in free fall you felt the cool air swooshing past you as you fell back on bed making a tiny thump as you landed on the bed sheets still staring up at the ceiling.

(Gasp) (gasp) (gasp) you where lying on the bed the fall had left you winded but otherwise unharmed you looked to your left side and saw calicos face hanging over you with a disappointed look on his face.

I told you not to move you could've gotten hurt he said with worry he looked at you and saw no injuries you were just winded (sigh) I guess I should've expected this he said rubbing his temple mike I wasn't trying to hurt you ok I was ju- I know what you were trying to do mike interrupted. You where trying to stuff me up your ass mike casually said causing calico to blush a little, well yeah I was but- but nothing I'm sorry but I'm not into guys you interrupted again.

WHAT BUT BUT!!!!

If your going to say why was I under your ass it's because you rolled over and sat on not because I like you. Calico couldn't believe his ears he really wasn't into men (sigh) well that's really unfortunate and he I was hoping that you'd be willing to go through with this I guess where gonna have to it the hard way he said looking into your eyes.

What do you mean mike said backing up, I mean that you don't really have a choice unless you wonna get thrown in the dungeon and locked up in some little cage hanging off the wall he said in a serious tone, gulp but I don't think I ca- you didn't get a chance to finish as calico grabbed you by the legs and lifted you in front of his face.

Then just let me do the work all you have to do is struggle whilst your in there he said whilst raising his tail in the air and bringing you in front of his pink tail hole now don't worry I keep it clean in there he said moving you closer to his sweaty butt hole.

Oh god oh god you muttered as your face was pushed up against his tail hole he started moving around in a circular motion moaning ooooohhhhhh we'll have fun in there kid he said before pushing you head first inside his butt.

Pant pant pant calico was having a great time every struggle sent him amazing pleasure, but the same couldn't be said for mike as he was having the worst day of his life.

Son of a bitch mike choked out first he sits on me know he's pushed me inside his ass what's next!!!!!!

There was nothing just your imagination
1221.content:
Inside the palace it seemed rather empty you were in the throne room where you were hoping there'd be some sort of party " damn it and here I was hoping to nick a few bits of jewellery " mike thought his luck had finally run out until he saw something sparkling on the queens chair, he look up at the sparkling object and saw it was a golden ring coated in dimonds " oh hell yeah " mike shouted jumping up and down in excitement.

Mike used the carvings in the chair leg as footholds to climb up to the seat of the chair once his hand touched the soft fabric of the cushion he lifted himself up onto the cushion and there right in front of him was his prize " oh yes huge bags of gold here I come " mike walked towards the jewel but stopped when he noticed.

choices: his Master walking into the slave house.
One of the other slaves walking towards him.
A new male slave entering the slave house.
A group of macros who were going to free the slaves.
13.content:
Name: Jim

Age: 20

Height: 5 foot 9 inches

Hair color: brown

Eye color: hazel

Build: Very thin, but not sickly thin.

Jim let out a heavy sigh as he stared at the stone brick walls that were in front of him after he had finished serving his Master and was taken to the slave house were he and other slaves stayed until they were taken to his Master for some sort of task. And sadly Jim was the only human slave among all macro male slaves. The human wasn't sure why his macro lion master only had males slaves, but from what he was told was that the Baron had the macros do a lot of hard labor around his home. Speaking of the other slaves these included a muscle gut macro anthro grizzly bear named Thor, a well muscled macro anthro fox named Niles, a lean muscled macro anthro raccoon named Peter, and finally a well muscled macro anthro skunk named Richard. And among the four macros Jim had bonded the most with Richard since he had the kindest to the human when he had been first taken to the slave house about five years ago. He was even nice enough to share what little food he had gotten with the human so he couldn't die from not eating. And during those five years the human learned the giant skunk was in his mid thirties and had been a slave for about ten years. However, when Jim was told about the tasks that he and others were made to do then it made sense to the human as to way all of the anthros were so fit. The other three macros however weren't that bad, but sometimes they did try to push the small human around as a way to get rid of their frustration of being slaves. Well, either that or they felt that Jim's tasks were far to easy compared to theirs. However, whenever they attempted to do this Jim was quickly picked up by Richard who warned the others to leave him alone. And quite honestly if it hadn't of been for the muscled skunk Jim knew that he would not have survived being a slave for those long five years.

One night though while Jim was sitting up against the giant brick wall he saw.....
13.title: Jim the slave

14.content:
Height: 3.3

Age: 9

Backstory: There was a large war between two kingdoms with fierce battled being faught. However the two rulers both did not want their civilians to be harmed. Unfortunately during the last battle a small village suffered the effects, everyone including Sean's parents died leaving him orphaned at a toddler's age.

Feeling enormous guilt the king decided to take Sean in as his own son. Within time they grew close as a father and son.

Despite his size Sean loved his father. Cuddling up for warmth on his massive body, eating giant versions of food, and always having a birds eye view.

"PRESENT"
Sean woke up as the light hit his face as he felt the ground rise and fall. Last night following a bad dream , he seeked comfort from his father who gladly offered putting him between his pectorals. They were his favorite place to sleep as it was warm and his father's heartbeat helped him fall asleep.

He decided it was about time to wake up his father...
14.title: Sean the Orphan

144.content:
Allen

Height: 5'7

Age:20

Backstory: Allen's kingdom the Principality of Goldleaf is one of the few remaining human kingdoms. In the past years, macros have easily crushed the other human's attempts to beat them, in turn making the humans part of their empire. It was only because of the Kingdom of Lionheart taking mercy on Allen's kingdom and protecting it that they were still standing.

Allen decided that he needed to help his kingdom, so he agreed on a political marriage with one of the princes of the macro kingdoms. All he could hope was that they could learn to care for one another.

The human carriage holding him rather then being pulled by horses was being held in the large palm of a macro. The muscular panther guard held a serious face as he held the carriage close to his buff chest, on guard in case anyone tried to attack him and the visiting prince.

Allen took a deep breath as he heard triumphants outside celebrating his arrival. He took a breath as the guard set his carriage on the ground. Exiting he glanced up at the looming panther, his black furred pecs partially blocking his face. The macro gave an encouraging nod to the human.

Allen turned as the ground shook and the prince he was to marry walked up. It was....
144.title: Allen The Human Prince

info.brief_description: You are in a kingdom of macros
info.description:
This is a make your own adventure type of thing pretty much anything goes besides inflation or herm not that I have anything against those it's just not my thing.

If you would like to add a chapter that would be greatly appreciated I'm not really too fussy about spelling or gramma just make sure it's understandable plz.

And please don't make it something like he or she stuffed him down his pants and now he's dead I want details.
